Uses of Interface
org.opengis.referencing.crs.SingleCRS

Packages that use SingleCRS
Package
Description
org.opengis.referencing.crs
Reference systems by coordinates.

  • Uses of SingleCRS in org.opengis.referencing.crs

    Subinterfaces of SingleCRS in org.opengis.referencing.crs
    Modifier and Type
    Interface
    Description
    interface 
    DerivedCRS
    A CRS that is defined by applying a coordinate conversion to another preexisting CRS.
    interface 
    EngineeringCRS
    A 1-, 2- or 3-dimensional CRS used locally.
    interface 
    GeneralDerivedCRS
    Deprecated.
    As of ISO 19111:2019, this interface is renamed as DerivedCRS.
    interface 
    GeocentricCRS
    Deprecated.
    This type was defined in 2003 but removed in 2007.
    interface 
    GeodeticCRS
    A 2- or 3-dimensional CRS used over the whole planet or substantial parts of it.
    interface 
    GeographicCRS
    A 2- or 3-dimensional CRS based on an ellipsoidal approximation of the geoid.
    interface 
    ImageCRS
    Deprecated.
    Replaced by EngineeringCRS as of ISO 19111:2019.
    interface 
    ParametricCRS
    A 1-dimensional CRS which uses parameter values or functions.
    interface 
    ProjectedCRS
    A 2- or 3-dimensional CRS based on an approximation of the shape of the planet's surface by a plane.
    interface 
    TemporalCRS
    A 1-dimensional CRS used for the recording of time.
    interface 
    VerticalCRS
    A 1-dimensional CRS used for recording heights or depths.
    Methods in org.opengis.referencing.crs that return types with arguments of type SingleCRS
    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    default List<SingleCRS>
    CompoundCRS.getSingleComponents()
    Returns the ordered list of CRS components, none of which itself compound.
